pitch.cc: Aaron Harang is trying to tie up Jon Jay with fastballs inside; Jay is hitting .444 on pitches in that location compared to .314 overall.
Aaron Harang is really trying to keep Ryan Theriot close; he is 4-for-4 in stolen base attempts this season.
